translation.en: Good morning. What you doin'?
Besides stalking JP, of course.
[Vee] I'm reading the news, thank you very much.

translation.en: [Sydney] Oh! You're reading the news.

translation.en: You're such a good liar.

translation.en: [Vee chuckling] Seriously, how do you know I'm stalking JP?

translation.en: Because I know you very, very well.
Oh, wait! Did you tell your mom 'bout CalArts yet?

translation.en: She's super excited for me to move across the country

translation.en: -No. -[Sydney] No?
No, I haven't found... I haven't found the right time to tell her.

translation.en: -[laptop beeps] -[Sydney] Oh! Nerve is starting.
Sorry, this is really important.

translation.en: [Vee] What's Nerve?
[Sydney] It's a game. Here, just click on the video.

translation.en: [male computer] Welcome to Nerve New York City.
Nerve is a 24-hour game.
Like Truth or Dare, minus the truth.

translation.en: Watchers pay to watch. Players play to win cash and glory.
translation.zh: ‏看客付费观看 ‏玩家参与赢得金钱和荣誉

translation.en: Are you a Watcher or a Player? Are you a Watcher or a Player? Are you a Watcher or a Player?
[Sydney] It's cool, right?
This looks very sketchy. Is this legal?

translation.en: [Sydney] I don't know. Probably not.
Just do it. Just sign up and watch. Time's ticking.

translation.en: Okay, signing up. Look, this is me signing up to watch you.

translation.en: Vee! You have to sign up and watch me.

translation.en: -[door closes] -It's very important that I have Watchers.

translation.en: I'll sign up after breakfast. I promise.

translation.en: Thank you. I love you. I'll see you in a little bit.

translation.en: -Bye. -[Sydney] Bye.
[Vee] I mean, Syd hasn't gotten into any schools yet.

translation.en: And she doesn't even care.
You know what? Sydney doesn't have to care. She has a trust fund.

translation.en: And you have something far more valuable than that.

translation.en: Here we go.
You have drive, you have focus.
You have a scholarship to a local college.
translation.zh: ‏你有本地大学给你提供的奖学金

translation.en: And even though we can't afford the dorm,
you get to have me as your new college roommate.

translation.en: Actually, I, um... I had kind of a cool idea about that.

translation.en: What if we fixed up Mike's room

translation.en: and listed you on Airbnb or something?

translation.en: Maybe it's time we finally go through his stuff

translation.en: and maybe give some of it to Goodwill.

translation.en: And I could give you some space.
I don't want space.
I just want you.
Okay.
I'm totally down with commuting. I can...

translation.en: I can get my reading done on the ferry.

translation.en: [Nancy] Yeah?
That'll work, right? Yeah.
[Hype Boi] Let's say, "Go Cougars" on the count of 1, 2, 3.

Let's go, Cougars! Let's go, Cougars!
-Hand me the zoom lens. -Here.
Doesn't it feel a little unbalanced

translation.en: if every single yearbook photo is of JP Guerrero?

translation.en: It's not my fault he's on the team.

translation.en: Here.

translation.en: [Tommy] Okay, guys. Be careful, careful.
[football player] Let's hit it, JP!
All right, let's go! Let's go! Come on!

You got it. Yeah, you got it. All right, be careful. Careful.
[Hype Boi over megaphone] Let's go, Cougars!
Let's hear it for Sydney Sloane! -The girl with the shades. -Let's go, Cougars.

Let's go, Cougars.
Liv! Liv!

-Okay. -[Liv] Okay. You're on!

Okay. Okay.
Nerd!

-This is so gross. This is so gross. -Don't think about it.

-Oh! Money, money! -[chuckling] Oh. Whoa!
I have so many Watchers now. Yeah, you do. Girl!
I just need to get in that little box thing.

But you don't have a dog.
I could still do it. -Or a dick, Liv. -[cell phone beeping]

It's easy.

I thought you were done playing Nerve.

No, no, no! Syd, no.

Well, which friend?

No, don't go! Come on!

-Not cool, Sydney. -[Sydney sighs]
I'm just trying to help her.
Let's not help her.

[male computer] Hello. Welcome to Nerve. You have chosen Player.

translation.en: Nerve is a direct democracy.
Watchers decide your dares.
The two Players with the most Watchers by the end of regulation
translation.zh: ‏截止规定时间 ‏拥有最多看客的两名玩家

translation.en: will advance to the final round, where the winner takes all.

translation.en: Watchers can watch from anywhere,
but they are encouraged to film live.
translation.zh: ‏但我们鼓励看客进行实时直播

translation.en: So don't be alarmed.
There are three rules.
One, all dares must be filmed on the Player's phone.

translation.en: Two, there are only two ways to be eliminated. Fail or bail.

translation.en: Three, snitches get stitches.

That's the point.

[sighs] Okay, okay. You're just gonna kiss some random person?

Okay. I'm gonna kiss that guy.

To the Lighthouse, that's my favourite book.

Uh... Okay, just tell me real quick.

translation.en: It basically represents the thing they want most in life.

[Tommy, muffled] One Mississippi, two Mississippi, three Mississippi, four Mississippi, five Mississippi.

-Okay. -Okay, bye. [chuckles]
I can't believe I just did that!

Should I check? Should totally check.

Ian, we love you!
[Ian] Love you, too!
All right, let's go!
58, 59, 60! [screaming]
-[Ian screaming] -We did it!
Oh, shit!
-Hold on! -God, oh, my God! Look out!
translation.zh: ‏小心 抓紧 ‏天啊 小心

translation.en: [Wes] Best dare ever! Vee is number one!
translation.zh: ‏最刺激的挑战没有之一 维是最棒的

translation.en: Oh, my God.
That was the craziest thing I've ever done. You were incredible.
translation.zh: ‏这是我干过的最疯狂的事 ‏你太了不起了

translation.en: I can't even believe we did that.
-[all gasping] -[partygoer] She kissed him!
[Wes] Oh, Vee! Get him, girl!
You hungry at all?
-Pizza? -Pizza... I swear, I was gonna say, "Pizza."
translation.zh: ‏-披萨 ‏-我发誓我刚才正想说“披萨”

translation.en: Hey, Watchers.
Okay, listen, you and I both know that I should be in that box.
translation.zh: ‏听着 我们都清楚 ‏进小框框的人应该是我

translation.en: So please, stop holding back. Okay?
translation.zh: ‏所以拜托你们不要有所保留

translation.en: You guys don't need to be afraid, because I'm not afraid.
translation.zh: ‏你们用不着有顾虑 我无所畏惧

translation.en: So just give me a real dare.
What's up, Syd Baby?
What are you doing here?
You're a good Player.
You've got a lot of Watchers. I got a lot of Watchers.
translation.zh: ‏你有一大批看客 ‏我也有一大批看客

translation.en: Maybe we could team up.
I don't need a partner.
Seems to work for your friend Vee.
translation.zh: ‏你的朋友维似乎很适应组队

translation.en: What up, Syd? You all right?
Yeah. We're just talking.
Yo, Mad Max, why don't you show yourself out, man?
translation.zh: ‏疯狂的麦克斯 ‏你自己找门出去吧 哥儿们

translation.en: Call me.
Break down!
Captain. [grunts]
[Ty] Party on, man.
Hey, Nancy.
[Nancy] Tommy, listen, I have a quick question.
How would I know if I'm being hacked?
translation.zh: ‏汤米 我问你一个问题 ‏我怎么确认我有没有被骇客入侵？

translation.en: [Tommy] What do you mean?
Hacked. Somebody's been depositing money
translation.zh: ‏被骇客入侵 ‏有人一直在以维的名义 ‏往我账户里存钱

translation.en: into my account under Vee's name.
translation.zh: ‏有人一直在以维的名义 ‏往我账户里存钱

translation.en: That doesn't sound like a hack.
Normally, they would take money out if they were hacking you.
translation.zh: ‏通常他们黑别人账户都是往外拿钱

translation.en: Thomas, what are you not telling me?
translation.zh: ‏托马斯 你是不是有事瞒着我？

translation.en: Oh! It must... It might be... Vee got a job.
[Nancy] What? A job?
Yeah, that's probably it.
She did an online poker thing. Okay.
translation.zh: ‏-她参加了网上的扑克比赛 ‏-好的

translation.en: -And she's really great at it. -Is it legal?
Yeah, it's legal. And she's doing great, as you can tell with the deposits.
translation.zh: ‏合法 她很厉害 ‏你从那些存款就能看出来

translation.en: But anyway, I gotta go.
I'm writing a paper right now on motorcycle safety.
translation.zh: ‏我正在写论文 关于摩托车安全问题

translation.en: -I'm gonna get goin', but... -Well, tell her to call me.
translation.zh: ‏-我得去继续写了 ‏-叫她给我打电话

translation.en: -Bye. -Bye.
Wanna take a ride?
Is this a dare?
Mmm-mmm. It's a carousel.
[Vee] So, why are you playing Nerve?
Trying to help out my family.
Some things happened that I wish turned out differently.
translation.zh: ‏发生了一些让我追悔莫及的事情

translation.en: Like what?
This is just kinda something I need to do.
[Ian] We got some paparazzi.
Hide.
What? Who is it?
-Pick up, pick up. -[Ian] You gonna get it?
translation.zh: ‏原来这就是西德妮 ‏快接 你要接吗？

translation.en: I don't wanna deal with her right now.
[Chuck] Ouch!
What's goin' on?
She's just been a lot recently.
But whatever, you don't wanna talk about that.
translation.zh: ‏算了 你肯定不想听我说这个

translation.en: If you wanna talk about it, I'm here. Happy to listen.
translation.zh: ‏你想说的话就说吧 我洗耳恭听

translation.en: I'm just tired of being her sidekick all the time.
translation.zh: ‏我只是不想总是当她的小跟班了

translation.en: It's funny. You don't seem like anyone's sidekick.
translation.zh: ‏你不像是会当别人的小跟班

translation.en: Can I see that picture again?
Sure.
Yeah. Guys go crazy for her.
translation.zh: ‏对 男生们都为她神魂颠倒

translation.en: No, I mean the picture itself. It's really good.
translation.zh: ‏不 我是说这张照片拍得很好

translation.en: Thanks, I took it.
Yeah? You have a good eye.
I just... I can't picture you hangin' out with someone like this.
translation.zh: ‏我想象不出 ‏你为什么会和这种人在一起

translation.en: What do you mean?
I don't know. She looks kind of...
translation.zh: ‏我不知道 她看起来有点缺乏自信

translation.en: Insecure. Is that mean?
translation.zh: ‏我不知道 她看起来有点缺乏自信 ‏我这么说是不是有点刻薄？

translation.en: -She is totally insecure. -Yeah?
She makes it seem like I'm the one who's insecure. But really it's her.
translation.zh: ‏她弄得好像没自信的人是我 ‏但其实是她

translation.en: It's exhausting. I'm sure.
She's at this party.
Most likely drunk and needs me to hold her hair back.
translation.zh: ‏她在派对上喝到吐的时候 ‏还得我帮她把头发撩起来

translation.en: I'm just over it.
I mean, so are her parents. They're constantly out of town,
translation.zh: ‏她父母也受不了她 他们经常去外地

translation.en: so she has this revolving door of guys over.
translation.zh: ‏所以一直有各种男生上她家过夜

translation.en: It's sad, actually.
Hey, that party. Should we maybe go check it out?
translation.zh: ‏那个派对 你想不想去看看？

translation.en: What? Why would I wanna go to that party?
translation.zh: ‏什么？为什么我要去那个派对？

translation.en: Maybe show off your new tattoo?
Show Sydney that you're not the person she thinks you are?
translation.zh: ‏向西德妮证明她对你的看法是错的

translation.en: [man] Yo, watch out! Heads up. Comin' through.
Yo, watch out.
[Sydney] Okay. I got this. Okay.
[woman 1] Go, Sydney!
[woman 2] You're better than this. Come on, just turn around.
translation.zh: ‏加油 西德妮 ‏这点小事难不倒你 加油 快过去

translation.en: [man 1] Come on, Syd, you got this.
translation.zh: ‏加油 西德 你可以的

translation.en: [woman 3] Come on, Syd, you started it, you gotta finish it.
translation.zh: ‏加油 西德 你可不能半途而废

translation.en: [woman 4] Come on, you got it. You got it!
Okay.
[Wes] Just take a deep breath. Just take a deep breath, Sydney.
translation.zh: ‏-深吸一口气 西德妮 ‏-加油 你可以的

translation.en: [man 2] Get in here! She's gonna do it!
You got this. Okay.
[Wes] There you go. Come on. [Chuck] Yeah, there you go!
translation.zh: ‏-就是这样 ‏-加油 ‏-对 就是这样 ‏-就是这样

translation.en: [Wes] There you go.
[woman 6] Somebody, go get Liv!
Oh, my God.
translation.zh: ‏我的天啊 你的手机在哪儿？

translation.en: [man 3] Come on, Syd. Focus. You got this.
translation.zh: ‏-我在拍 ‏-加油 西德 ‏集中精神 你可以的

translation.en: Liv! Liv! Liv, Liv, Liv, come, come, come.
Excuse me, excuse me.
Oh, my God. Syd!
[Wes] Be careful. Be careful, Syd.
translation.zh: ‏-小心点 西德妮 ‏-你在干什么？

translation.en: [Liv] What are you doing? Oh, my God!
translation.zh: ‏-小心点 西德妮 ‏-你在干什么？ ‏西德 你没必要这么做 快回来

translation.en: [Wes] Come on, Syd, you don't have to do this. Come back.
translation.zh: ‏西德 你没必要这么做 快回来

translation.en: Shut up!
[Liv] Sydney, come back.
Oh, my God, Sydney! [Chuck] Yeah! There you go.
translation.zh: ‏加油 西德妮 对 就是这样

translation.en: [Liv] You don't have to do it. [Wes] Take your time, Syd. Don't look down.
translation.zh: ‏慢慢来 西德 别往下看

translation.en: [Liv] It's just a stupid game!
[Wes] Come on, we're right here. You could always turn back, Syd.
translation.zh: ‏我们在你后面 ‏你随时可以退回来 西德

translation.en: -[Liv] JP, grab her. -Come on, you gotta film.
translation.zh: ‏韦斯 拽住她 ‏你得拍下来 西德妮 ‏你不拍就不算数

translation.en: Sydney, it's not gonna count unless you film it.
translation.zh: ‏你得拍下来 西德妮 ‏你不拍就不算数

translation.en: [Wes] Don't worry about the phone.
translation.zh: ‏-别去想手机的事 ‏-查克 你闭嘴

translation.en: [Chuck] She has to film it! She can't... It doesn't count unless she films it. She has to film it.
translation.zh: ‏她不拍的话不算数 她必须拍下来

translation.en: [Liv] Just bail. Just come back.
[Chuck] She has to film it. No, but she has to film it.
translation.zh: ‏-她得自己拍下来 ‏-闭嘴 查克

translation.en: -[Wes] Shut up, Chuck! -Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
translation.zh: ‏-她得自己拍下来 ‏-闭嘴 查克 ‏我的天啊

translation.en: [Wes] This is crazy. All right, there you go. Don't look down.
translation.zh: ‏-你真是疯了 ‏-很好 就是这样 别往下看

translation.en: [breathing heavily] I can't! Oh, my God, I can't, I can't!
[Chuck] Sydney, you gotta get up.
translation.zh: ‏西德妮 你得站起来做点什么

translation.en: -You gotta do something. -Stop yelling at me! -Stop! You're not helping. -[Wes] Chuck, shut up! Shut up, she's got it.
translation.zh: ‏别冲我嚷嚷 别吵了 你们得帮帮我

translation.en: [Chuck] She has to get it done!
translation.zh: ‏她必须完成挑战 别去烦她

translation.en: [woman 1] Shut up!
Syd, it's gonna take too long, you gotta stand, you gotta walk.
translation.zh: ‏西德 这样太花时间了 ‏你得站起来用走的

translation.en: [Liv] No, don't stand, Sydney.
translation.zh: ‏不 别站起来 西德妮

translation.en: Shut up! Shut up, Chuck!
[Wes] You heard her, Chuck, shut up.
[Chuck] She's gotta get it done.
She's not gonna get here in time unless you get up and walk. You have to walk.
[Wes] Don't listen to him, Syd, you got it. [Chuck] She has to! She's wasting time!
translation.zh: ‏她必须站起来 没有时间了

translation.en: Shut up, both of you!
[Wes] You got it. Come on, Syd, you got this.
translation.zh: ‏你可以的 加油 西德

translation.en: [Sydney] I can't, I can't, I can't. I bail, I bail, I bail.
[male computer] You bail.
[male computer] You fail.
[male computer] You fail.
This is so dumb.
Come here! Hold on!
translation.zh: ‏回来 站住 你干什么？

translation.en: [male computer] You fail.
Oh! Look at these guys!
[Liv] Vee!
-Hi. -[Vee] Hi! Oh, my gosh. You guys are so famous right now.
translation.zh: ‏嗨 我的妈啊 你们现在是大红人了

translation.en: Uh-oh! Wait until Syd sees you.
But where is she?
Oh, you guys don't know?
Yeah, she tried to walk across that ladder and just bailed.
translation.zh: ‏她想从梯子上走过去 但最后放弃了

translation.en: So she's outta the game?
Hey, let's get a drink.
Yeah. It wasn't pretty.
[Vee] Have you seen Sydney?
-In there. -Syd?
Oh, come on, Vee, you never even spoke to him.
translation.zh: ‏拉倒吧 维 ‏你跟他连话都没说过一句

translation.en: It's fine. Certainly, no surprise.
translation.zh: ‏没关系 我一点也不惊讶

translation.en: Yeah, I know it's not a surprise.
translation.zh: ‏对 我知道你一点也不惊讶

translation.en: You know what's not fine, though?
I almost died tonight, Vee, and you were nowhere to be found.
translation.zh: ‏我今晚差一点就死了 维 ‏你却连个人影都找不到

translation.en: I'm sorry. When you said I should live my life,
translation.zh: ‏不好意思 ‏你之前说要我过自己的生活

translation.en: did you mean I should live my life in your shadow?
translation.zh: ‏是指要我在你的影子里 ‏过自己的生活吗？

translation.en: I was just trying to help you, Vee, because you're the most repressed person that I know.
translation.zh: ‏我想帮你 维 ‏你是我认识的最消沉的人

translation.en: Well, isn't that why you keep me around?
translation.zh: ‏这就是你跟我在一起的原因

translation.en: Because I never tell you the truth?
translation.zh: ‏因为我从来不说实话戳穿你

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Vee] Come on, let's go.
I guess you don't tell me the truth.
translation.zh: ‏你是从来没说实话戳穿过我

translation.en: Because you never told me about how insecure I am.
translation.zh: ‏你从来没对我说过我有多么缺乏自信

translation.en: Or about how I just have a revolving door of guys all the time.
translation.zh: ‏多么喜欢让各种男生上我家过夜 ‏（完成西德妮的挑战 ‏一万五千美元）

translation.en: You never tell me that, but you've told everyone that tonight.
translation.zh: ‏你从来没对我说过 ‏但你今晚对所有人说了

translation.en: So please, Vee, go right ahead and show us all
translation.zh: ‏所以拜托你 维 让大家看看 ‏你是怎么只用了短短半天时间

translation.en: what a fiery little spark plug you've become since lunch.
translation.zh: ‏你是怎么只用了短短半天时间 ‏就变成了一个活蹦乱跳的社交大咖

translation.en: Let's go.
Shots fired.
Don't walk away from me. Vee! Wake up!
translation.zh: ‏别丢下我自己走掉 维 ‏清醒一点 这是个游戏

translation.en: This is a game.
Do you really think that someone like him
is actually gonna be with you when this is all done?
Hey, you don't know me.
-Oh, I'm sorry. You really like her now? -[Ian] Yeah, I do.
translation.zh: ‏真对不起 敢情你真喜欢上她了？ ‏没错

translation.en: All right, come on, Syd, you're just drunk.
translation.zh: ‏别闹了 西德 你喝醉了

translation.en: Tommy, it is time to get over her! Clearly, she has traded up!
translation.zh: ‏汤米 你也该放弃她了 ‏她已经以旧换新了

translation.en: Why do you have to be such a bitch?
[Sydney] Look at that! Little Vee finally speaking her mind.
translation.zh: ‏瞧瞧 小可怜维终于说出真心话了

translation.en: Come on! Unburden yourself!
Do you know why we're best friends?
translation.zh: ‏你知道为什么我们是好朋友吗？

translation.en: I do whatever you want all the time.
No, Vee, we're friends
translation.zh: ‏不是的 维 我们之所以能做朋友

translation.en: because I'm fun and you're boring.
translation.zh: ‏是因为我很有趣而你很无聊

translation.en: The only fun thing about you was your brother.
translation.zh: ‏你身上唯一有趣的点是你哥哥

translation.en: [Sydney] What is it you think? That playing Nerve is just gonna magically make you a different person?
translation.zh: ‏你以为玩《试胆》 ‏就能让你麻雀变凤凰吗？

translation.en: That's not how life works. You'll never be a Player.
translation.zh: ‏现实才没那么简单 ‏你永远当不了玩家

translation.en: You're right.
I know how much you love living in the moment, Syd.
translation.zh: ‏我知道你有多么享受活在当下 西德

translation.en: Well, remember this moment.
Because you're one of those girls who peaks in high school.
translation.zh: ‏因为你一生能风光的 ‏就只有高中这会儿

translation.en: And when you wake up one day, still living in Staten Island,
translation.zh: ‏将来有一天你睁开眼睛会发现 ‏你依然在斯塔滕岛上 ‏跟同一帮男生鬼混

translation.en: still screwing the same guys,
translation.zh: ‏你依然在斯塔滕岛上 ‏跟同一帮男生鬼混

translation.en: wondering what the hell happened to your life.
translation.zh: ‏不知道自己的生活到底出了什么问题

translation.en: If you wanna know where I am from now on,
translation.zh: ‏从现在起你要想知道我在哪儿

translation.en: sign up and watch me.
translation.zh: ‏那就注册到游戏里来观看我

translation.en: [Ian] Wait, Vee, what are you doing?
translation.zh: ‏等等 维 你想干什么？

translation.en: Hey, Vee, you don't need to do this.
Look at me. Come on. Let's just go, let's bail, all right? What do you have to prove?
translation.zh: ‏看着我 我们放弃吧 ‏你想证明什么？

translation.en: Come on, please. Let's go.
translation.zh: ‏维 回来 我们离开这儿

translation.en: [Chuck] Come on, you got it, Vee, please! [girl 1] Go, girl! [girl 2] Vee!
[Liv] Oh, my God. Vee!
[Chuck] You got it, Vee!
That's how you get into first, Vee!
That was messed up.
I can't deal with this right now. I'm gonna go.
translation.zh: ‏我现在不想跟你说这个 我得走了

translation.en: Vee, did you know that he's played Nerve before?
translation.zh: ‏维 你知道 ‏他以前就玩过《试胆》吗？

translation.en: What?
Yeah, it was his dare to get you here and fight with Syd.
translation.zh: ‏把你带到这儿来 ‏跟西德对峙是他的挑战

translation.en: That's why he brought you here.
translation.zh: ‏所以他才带你过来 你看

translation.en: Look.
You still trust him?
-Vee, wait. Wait. -Is it true?
translation.zh: ‏维 等等 ‏-是真的吗？ ‏-什么是真的？

translation.en: Is what true?
translation.zh: ‏-是真的吗？ ‏-什么是真的？ ‏维 你要去哪儿？

translation.en: Did you take me here as part of the game?
translation.zh: ‏你带我过来是游戏的要求吗？

translation.en: -[door opens] -Answer me! Is it true?
What are you doing?
It's more complicated than that.
I just lost my two best friends tonight.
translation.zh: ‏我今晚跟我两个最好的朋友闹掰了

translation.en: How much did you get for that?
translation.zh: ‏完成这项挑战你拿到了多少钱？

translation.en: No, no, it's not about the money, all right?
But I promise I'll explain everything later.
Just don't even bother, okay? I mean, Sydney almost died tonight.
translation.zh: ‏你不用解释 西德妮今晚差点就死了

translation.en: -I almost died tonight. -Vee, I know, I know.
This game is sick. I'm going to the police.
translation.zh: ‏这游戏太变态了 我要去报警

translation.en: Wait, no, no! No!
-I'm sorry, Vee... -What are you doing?
I'm sorry, you can't do that, all right? You can't go to the police.
translation.zh: ‏你不能那么做 不能去找警察

translation.en: Why not? Because I'll lose the game?
translation.zh: ‏为什么不能？因为那样我就输了吗？

translation.en: No, it's not about that! Vee! Vee!
translation.zh: ‏不是的 跟输赢没有关系 维

translation.en: You can't go to the police. It's the last thing you wanna do.
translation.zh: ‏你不能去找警察 这么做你会后悔的

translation.en: Vee, wait, I wasn't trying to hurt you. It just got outta control.
translation.zh: ‏我不是有意伤害你 ‏事情超出了我的控制

translation.en: Move! Get out of the way!
Officer!
Officer! Officer, I need help. I'm...
I'm playing this game. It's called Nerve.
And I'm worried that someone's gonna get really hurt. [man] Uh-oh.
translation.zh: ‏我担心玩游戏的人会遇到危险

translation.en: Snitch!
A game? They playin', too?
[Vee] Yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: ‏哥儿们 赶紧离开这儿 快走

translation.en: There's a crime being committed?
No, but a kid could die tonight.
translation.zh: ‏没有 但是有个人今晚差点死了

translation.en: Look, here, it's all on my phone. You can see.
translation.zh: ‏都在我手机上 你自己看

translation.en: What? What?
[all] Snitch! [woman] Snitches get stitches!
Mom? [Nancy] Honey, what's going on?
translation.zh: ‏-妈妈 ‏-宝贝 发生什么事了？

translation.en: Mom!
[Nancy] Vee, where are you?
All the money is missing from our account!
translation.zh: ‏我们银行账户里的钱全都不见了

translation.en: Wait, what?
Vee, honey, are you in trouble?
translation.zh: ‏维 宝贝 你是不是惹上麻烦了？

translation.en: Can you just, please, tell me what's going on?
translation.zh: ‏能不能告诉我到底是怎么回事？

translation.en: Okay, Mom, I'm gonna fix this, I promise.
translation.zh: ‏妈妈 我会处理的 我答应你

translation.en: [Nancy] Fix what?
Hello? Vee!
-Hello? Vee! Fix what? -I'm sorry, but I gotta win this game.
[male computer] Hello, Vee.
You broke the rules. You are our prisoner.
translation.zh: ‏你违反了规则 现在你是我们的囚徒

translation.en: We told you not to snitch.
Now we control your life.
We control your family.
We control your future.
The only way out is to win the final round.
translation.zh: ‏你唯一的出路是在决赛中获胜

translation.en: Go to the Staten Island Ferry and the Watchers will find you.
translation.zh: ‏到斯塔滕岛轮渡码头 ‏看客们会找到你

translation.en: -See you in the finals. -[grunting] See you in the finals. See you in the finals.
[man] Checkin' over here.
I'm comin' for you, Vee!
Vee, thank God! Are you okay?
translation.zh: ‏维 谢天谢地 你没事吧？

translation.en: Am I okay? No, I'm not okay!
translation.zh: ‏我有没有事？我有事 我很有事

translation.en: You need to tell me everything. Okay, what the hell is going on?
translation.zh: ‏你给我把话说清楚 ‏这到底是怎么回事？

translation.en: -Come here, come here. -Why is this happening to me?
translation.zh: ‏-过来 ‏-为什么这种事会发生在我身上？

translation.en: 'Kay, that guy Ty.
We both played Nerve last year in Seattle.
translation.zh: ‏我跟他去年都在西雅图玩过《试胆》

translation.en: We got a dare to hang from a construction crane 200 feet in the air.
translation.zh: ‏我们接到一个挑战 ‏悬空吊在 ‏离地面200英尺高的起重机上

translation.en: The two of us and this kid named Robbie.
translation.zh: ‏除了我们俩还有一个叫罗比的男孩

translation.en: [Robbie] Five! Four! Three!
[Ian] Come on, Robbie, that's enough. [Ty] Shit, he's slipping.
translation.zh: ‏行了 罗比 已经够了 ‏见鬼 他的手滑了

translation.en: [Robbie] Two! One! [Ty] Climb back up, man. [Ty] Ian, grab him. [Ian] Grab my hand!
translation.zh: ‏-快点抓住我的手 ‏-哥儿们 伊恩 拽住他

translation.en: Ty and I, we bailed and we went to the cops.
translation.zh: ‏我和泰放弃了挑战 ‏我们去找警察想让他们取缔这个游戏

translation.en: We tried to get the game shut down,
translation.zh: ‏我们去找警察想让他们取缔这个游戏

translation.en: but they didn't do anything.
translation.zh: ‏可是警察什么都没做 ‏只说那是一场意外

translation.en: No, they just called it an accident.
translation.zh: ‏可是警察什么都没做 ‏只说那是一场意外 ‏你躲不了的

translation.en: Then the Watchers, they... They came after us for snitching.
translation.zh: ‏然后看客们就来抓我们两个告密者

translation.en: They messed with my dad's job.
They leaked photos of my sister online.
They stole our identities, Vee.
translation.zh: ‏他们偷了我们的身份资料 维

translation.en: Me and Ty, we became Prisoners of the game.
translation.zh: ‏我和泰变成了这个游戏的囚徒

translation.en: Oh, come on. What does that even mean?
It's the third category.
Watcher, Player, Prisoner.
I'm trapped. The only way out is to win.
translation.zh: ‏我被囚禁了 唯一的出路就是获胜

translation.en: So you have to win.
No. No, you do.
What?
Vee, you're a Prisoner now.
You and I, we're going to the final round together and I'm gonna lose.
translation.zh: ‏你和我一起进入决赛然后我会输给你

translation.en: What? No, you can't do that.
It's already done. It's already done.
I told the Watchers to give me a dare
that's gonna knock Ty outta second place.
translation.zh: ‏让我可以把泰拉下第二名的位置

translation.en: It's gonna be me and you.
-I have to go. -No, no, no.
translation.zh: ‏我得走了 ‏-不行 不要 ‏-我带你去个安全的地方 走吧

translation.en: Yeah, I wanna take you somewhere safe. Let's go!
translation.zh: ‏-不行 不要 ‏-我带你去个安全的地方 走吧

translation.en: There has to be another way.
There isn't.
If it's not me in the finals, then it's Ty.
translation.zh: ‏进决赛的肯定会是我和泰之中一个

translation.en: And he'll do anything to win.
Just tell me we're gonna do this.
It's not your fault.
I just hope she's okay.
-Hello? -[Vee] Guys, it's me.
Oh, my God! Vee, where are you?
translation.zh: ‏谢天谢地 维 你在哪儿？

translation.en: [Vee] I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: ‏-真的很对不起 ‏-没关系 你没事就好

translation.en: Doesn't matter. I'm just glad you're okay.
translation.zh: ‏行了 别说了 快走吧

translation.en: [Sydney] What?
I have to finish this.
Are you insane?
What are you talking about?
translation.zh: ‏维 你这是在说什么傻话？

translation.en: Look, it's never gonna end.
I mean, even if they leave me alone,
they're just gonna do it to somebody else.
We can't stop the game if we wanted to. There's no one to stop.
translation.zh: ‏就算我们想阻止这游戏也没用 ‏-我们对抗的不是个体 ‏-是一大群匿名用户

translation.en: It's just a bunch of anonymous people.
translation.zh: ‏-我们对抗的不是个体 ‏-是一大群匿名用户

translation.en: What if they weren't anonymous?
[Vee] Ian's doing a dare that would put him in the finals.
translation.zh: ‏伊恩在做一项挑战 ‏让他能够和我一起进入决赛

translation.en: So it could be me against him.
translation.zh: ‏让他能够和我一起进入决赛

translation.en: [Sydney] Vee, do you actually trust this guy?
translation.zh: ‏维 你真的相信这家伙吗？

translation.en: He is the person who got you into this mess in the first place.
translation.zh: ‏最开始把你卷进这场灾难的人就是他

translation.en: I got me into this mess.
Anything Ian's doing now is to help me get out.
translation.zh: ‏伊恩现在做的一切都是为了救我

translation.en: [Vee] I know it sounds crazy, but I can do it.
translation.zh: ‏我知道听上去很扯 ‏但是我能做到 只要你们肯帮我

translation.en: I just need your help.
translation.zh: ‏但是我能做到 只要你们肯帮我

translation.en: What do you need us to do?
Tommy, you said the game is open source, right?
translation.zh: ‏汤米 你说过 ‏这个游戏是开源的 对吗？

translation.en: Do you think you can change the code?
[Tommy] It's gonna take time.
[Vee] Syd, could you buy us some?
translation.zh: ‏西德 你能帮忙争取时间吗？

translation.en: Hey. Now climb the crane.
Syd?
Yeah?
Use a payphone.
Ah!
[male computer] Hang for five seconds. Hang for five seconds.
Hang with one hand. Hang with one hand.
[Ian] Shit!
One! Two! Three! Four! Five!
[Hacker Kween] Yeah, it's over here, Tommy. We don't have a lot of time.
translation.zh: ‏到我这儿来 汤米 我们时间不多了

translation.en: Okay, yeah. We're on our way. We'll see you soon. How did it go?
translation.zh: ‏-好的 我们这就过来 待会儿见 ‏-谈得怎么样？

translation.en: It went.
It went?
Yeah. I think it's gonna work.
Yeah, better work.
translation.zh: ‏好 最好能行 真要命

translation.en: What is this place?
Fastest Internet in New York City.
Hey, Tommy!
[Tommy] Hey, HK, we made it.
[Hacker Kween] Let's get this started. You ready?
translation.zh: ‏那就开工吧 你准备好了吗？

translation.en: -Is the botnet up and running? -Yeah, of course. We just gotta enter it into the system.
translation.zh: ‏僵尸网络在工作吗？ ‏当然 只要把程序上传至系统就行

translation.en: Oh, and this is Sydney. Obviously.
translation.zh: ‏这是西德妮 不用我介绍了

translation.en: [Sydney] Hey. [Hacker Kween] Hey. Welcome to the cloud.
translation.zh: ‏（决赛 维99 对战 伊恩） ‏欢迎来到云端 你被毙了 真是倒霉

translation.en: Sucks you got axed.
translation.zh: ‏欢迎来到云端 你被毙了 真是倒霉

translation.en: All right. Let's take this game down.
[Sydney] Okay, how's this gonna work?
It's like Wikipedia, where anyone can edit the code
translation.zh: ‏这就像维基百科 ‏任何人都可以编辑网站代码

translation.en: but the majority has to approve it.
translation.zh: ‏但必须经过大多数用户同意才能生效

translation.en: And then the botnet can outvote everyone.
translation.zh: ‏用僵尸网络可以操控票数否决其他人

translation.en: Yo, I got a army of bots here waitin' for orders.
translation.zh: ‏我有一支僵尸大军正随时待命

translation.en: -Hey, Nancy. -[Nancy] Where is Vee? What is this game?
translation.zh: ‏嘿 南希 ‏维在哪里？这到底是什么游戏？

translation.en: [Tommy] Don't worry, she's okay.
I want you to explain it to me.
I'm gonna give you an address.
Okay, if you meet me here, I'll explain everything.
translation.zh: ‏你到这儿来找我 ‏我会跟你一一解释的

translation.en: [man] Ticket?
Better hurry up.
Guys, it's starting!
[all chanting] Vee! Vee! Vee! Vee!
[male computer] Players, stop!
Back up.
Stop.
All right, how many bots do we got in?
Not enough yet, but we are getting there.
translation.zh: ‏现在还不够 不过应该快好了

translation.en: [male computer] Players, show us your weapons.
translation.zh: ‏（《试胆》决赛） ‏玩家双方 拿出你们的武器

translation.en: First to shoot wins.
Twenty seconds on the clock.
Twenty seconds? HK, I need backup!
translation.zh: ‏什么？只有20秒？ ‏HK 我需要增援

translation.en: -[male computer] Begin. -Do it.
Start by just raising your gun. Just raise your gun slowly.
translation.zh: ‏先把你的枪举起来 慢慢举起来

translation.en: Then shoot me in the shoulder. I'll be fine.
translation.zh: ‏朝我的肩膀开枪 我没事的

translation.en: What if I miss? I don't know if I can do this.
translation.zh: ‏要是我打偏了呢？ ‏我不知道我能不能做到

translation.en: Oh, come on! Just shut up and play the game!
Vee, you have to hurry, all right?
You have to do this! This is the only way the game can end.
translation.zh: ‏你必须这么做 ‏这是让游戏结束的唯一办法

translation.en: And then you can walk away.
[male computer] Five, four, three, two, one!
I'm not doing this.
I'll do it!
-Oh, shit. -They're onto us.
translation.zh: ‏见鬼 ‏我们暴露了 ‏所有境外协议地址都被封了

translation.en: They're blockin' all of our foreign IPs!
translation.zh: ‏我们暴露了 ‏所有境外协议地址都被封了

translation.en: Tommy, do something!
Did y'all miss me?
And I say we do that dare again.
With someone who's really ready to play.
translation.zh: ‏这一次换一个真正想赢的人来玩

translation.en: Yeah!
Don't do it, Ty, it's not worth it, man.
translation.zh: ‏别这样 泰 这么做不值得

translation.en: -[Vee] Stop! -Whoa, whoa, back up!
Whoa, whoa, whoa!
[Ty] You have lost your mind, pretty boy!
translation.zh: ‏你被冲昏头了 大情圣 退后

translation.en: -Get back! -Is this what you really want? For us to kill each other?
translation.zh: ‏这就是你们想要的吗？ ‏看我们自相残杀

translation.en: -[all] Yeah! -Of course it's what you want!
[man] Kill 'em!
You think that takes nerve?
translation.zh: ‏你们觉得这样就算有胆量了？

translation.en: Why don't you take off your masks and show yourselves, huh?
translation.zh: ‏为什么不摘下面具把脸露出来？

translation.en: You, take off your mask.
Yeah, what's your name?
It's easy for you to be brave in a crowd!
translation.zh: ‏像这样躲在人群里逞威风谁不会

translation.en: Hiding behind your screen names.
Don't you guys see that you're all still responsible for what happens tonight,
translation.zh: ‏今晚发生的一切 ‏你们所有人都难辞其咎

translation.en: even if you are just watching?
Oh, my God! Are you really believing this bullshit?
Play to win!
Play to win.
You guys really want one of us to die? For a game?
translation.zh: ‏你们真想让我们中的一个人去死吗？ ‏就为了一个游戏

translation.en: Yes! Yes!
Then shoot me.
I dare you.
Okay.
Who wants me to shoot her?
Vee, what are you doing?
Who wants me to shoot her?
Tommy, where's Vee?
translation.zh: ‏汤米 维在哪儿？这是个什么游戏？

translation.en: I want answers! What are you doing?
translation.zh: ‏-别激动 ‏-我要你给我说清楚 ‏你们在干什么？

translation.en: You better tell me right now or I'm calling the cops.
translation.zh: ‏你现在就跟我说清楚 ‏不然我就报警了

translation.en: -No! No, Nancy, calm down. -No cops.
translation.zh: ‏-不行 南希 别报警 ‏-冷静点

translation.en: [Ty] Do you want me to shoot her?
-[all chanting] Shoot to kill! -Then vote "Yes." Shoot to kill!
Vote "Yes" if you want me to shoot her!
translation.zh: ‏想要我朝她开枪 就投“是”

translation.en: Don't listen to him! Say, "No!"
You want me to shoot her? You want me to shoot her?
[Wes] Come on, guys, "No"!
Guys, vote "No"!
You! Vote "Yes"! Vote "Yes"!
[Ty] Let me know! Vote "Yes"!
[Ian] Don't listen to him! Say, "No!"
Come on! Let's have a little bit of anarchy.
All right, we're getting around them.
The IPs are coming in faster now.
translation.zh: ‏协议地址输入的速度更快了

translation.en: Vee, we need to go, right now!
Oh, my God!
Okay, all right. Come on, guys. Keep going.
translation.zh: ‏快点 伙计们 手别停

translation.en: -[crying] Oh, my God! -No, no, no, it's...
[Ian] Vee, please! Please, please! No. No, no, no.
Do you hear me, Vee? Look at me, Vee, please!
translation.zh: ‏能听见我说话吗？看看我 维 求你

translation.en: Go.
[partygoer 1] Dude, are you getting this?
translation.zh: ‏（尼克·斯通 你是谋杀帮凶） ‏哥儿们 你收到这个了吗？

translation.en: [partygoer 2] That's my real name.
No, wait, stop, stop!
My God! [Vee] It's okay, it's okay!
Stop! It's okay. I'm okay. It's okay.
translation.zh: ‏别开枪 没事了 我没事

translation.en: Oh, my God!
Sorry.
You were in on this?
It was her plan, man. Her friend Sydney called me.
translation.zh: ‏这是她的计划 哥儿们 ‏她的朋友西德妮联系了我 ‏所以我才会来

translation.en: That's why I'm here.
translation.zh: ‏她的朋友西德妮联系了我 ‏所以我才会来

translation.en: The gun... What?
Blanks, bro.
It's fake.
Oh, my God.
You scared me.
You scared me.
We cool?
Yeah. We're free.
She's a badass. Watch out for her.
translation.zh: ‏她是个狠角儿 你可小心点

translation.en: [Hacker Kween] That's it. The last Player's out. [Tommy] Did we get it?
translation.zh: ‏-好 最后一个玩家退出了 ‏-我们成功了吗？

translation.en: [Hacker Kween] They're out. Think it's crashing!
translation.zh: ‏-玩儿完了 游戏崩溃了 ‏-我们成功了

translation.en: -We got it? -And Nerve is officially offline!
translation.zh: ‏《试胆》正式下线停止运营 ‏我们成功了

translation.en: -Wow! We have gamed the game. -Whoo!
You guys are the dumbest smart kids I've ever met.
translation.zh: ‏你们是我见过最不长脑子的聪明孩子

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
No, no, I'm sorry. I'm sorry for bringing you into all this.
translation.zh: ‏不 我才该道歉 ‏我不该把你卷进这一切

translation.en: I just wish that we could've met some other way.
translation.zh: ‏我真后悔我们是以这种方式相遇的

translation.en: I don't.
Oh, man!
And you. What a rock star.
translation.zh: ‏大功臣 今晚你很耀眼啊

translation.en: [Hacker Kween] Looks like I can get all your money back.
translation.zh: ‏我好像可以帮你们把钱找回来

translation.en: They don't call me Hacker Kween for nothin'.
translation.zh: ‏我黑客奎恩的名号可不是白叫的

translation.en: -Really? Thanks. -Yeah.
[Ian] Crazy first date, huh?
Is that what that was? [chuckles]
[Ian] By the way, my real name is Sam.
[Vee] Well, it's nice to meet you, Sam.
-It's nice to meet you, Vee. -[laughs]
Hey, Vee, it's 28 degrees in New York!
translation.zh: ‏（维 今天纽约只有零下两度）
